snappy-templates.DirectionSnapIntervalHi: The incremental degrees to snap a template's direction to. (Should be a factor of 360, set to 0 or hold Shift to disable)
snappy-templates.DistanceSnapIntervalHin: The incremental units to snap a template's distance to. (Set to 0 or hold Shift to disable)
snappy-templates.OriginSnapModeHint: Snap the origin point to the grid cell's center, corner, or both.
